parameters.query: SELECT * FROM atomic_questions WHERE domain = COALESCE($1, domain) LIMIT $2

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ contents: [{ parts: [{ text: $json.gemini_prompt }] }], generationConfig: { temperature: 0.5, maxOutputTokens: 4096 } }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO converted_questions (id, batch_id, format_type, question_data, created_at) SELECT gen_random_uuid(), $1, data->>'type', data, NOW() FROM jsonb_array_elements($2::jsonb) AS data RETURNING id
